annotations.text:
14.The Handbook to Literary Research – (Eds.) Delia Da Sousa Correa &
W.R. Owens, Routledge, London, 2010
15.Your Masters Thesis : How to plan, draft, write and revise – (Ed.) Dr.
Alan Bond, Viva Books Private Limited, New Delhi, 2007
16.How to write a Thesis – Umberto Eco, The MIT Press, London, 2012
17.Assignment and Thesis Writing – Jonathan Anderson & Millicent Poole,
CBS Publishers, New Delhi, 2011
18.The Craft of Language and Literary Research – Syed Mohammed
Haseebuddin Quadri, Atlantic Publishers, New Delhi, 2019
19.Introducing Research Methodology – Uwe Flick, Sage Publishers, New
Delhi, 2017
20.Research Methodology – Ranjith Kumar, Sage Publishers, New Delhi,
2011
21.Research Methodology : Methods and Techniques – C.R. Kothari, New
Age International Publishers, New Delhi, 1990
22.A Handbook of Critical Approaches to Literature – Wilfred L. Guerin,
Earle Labor, Lee Morgan, Jeanne C. Reesman, John R Willingham, Oxford
University Press, New York, 1999
23.Critical Thinking Academic writing and Presentation skills – Marilyn
Anderson, Pramod K. Nayar, Madhucchandra Sen, Pearson, New Delhi, 2008
24.Methodological Thinking – Donileen R. Loseke, Sage Publications, New
Delhi, 2013
25.Critical Thinking : An Introduction – Alec Fisher, Cambridge University
Press, New Delhi, 2001
26.Research Methods in Literature : An Introduction – Vijayakumar
Ambadasrao Patil, Authors Press, New delhi, 2019
27.Writing Dissertations & Theses – Neil Murray & David Beglar, Pearson,
London, 2009
28.Writing with Style (APA Style made easy) – Lenore T. Szuchman, Wadsworth,
USA, 2011
29.MLA Handbook for Writers of Research Paper 7th edition – Affiliated East-
West Press Pvt Ltd, New Delhi, 2009
30.A Manual for Writers of research papers, theses and dissertations(Chicago
Style) – Kate L. Turabian, The University of Chicago Press, Chicago, 2017
